subsections.description: Interact on a Beast Mode pedestal to temporarily turn into the Beast. In the mode, you can melee, shock, and grapple. You can only turn into the Beast once per round, and each pedestal can also only be used once per round. This is required to power Perk Machines and open certain parts of the map.

pic.alt: Pedestal to enter Beast Mode
Power panel to shock
Wooden door to melee
Eagle head to grapple to

step.title: Aquire the Summoning Key
step.description: Use Beast Mode to melee a box in the spawn area containing the Summoning Key.

pic.alt: Crate to melee
Summoning Key

step.title: Sacrifice Rituals
step.description: The rituals can be done in any order. Each ritual requires getting an artifact and opening the ritual room, both of which require Beast Mode. After exiting Beast Mode, pick up the artifact and bring it to the ritual room. Interact to place the artifact, then interact again to begin the ritual. The ritual will last a short time, and killing the Keepers is optional. After the ritual is finished, collect the Gateworm from the table where the ritual was started.

pic.alt: Gateworm

step.title: Nero Blackstone's Ritual (Junction)
step.description: In Beast Mode, shock the power panel on the crane to drop the artifact. Then, grapple to a balcony above Easy Street, run through the building to the stairs behind Easy Street, and shock the power panel to unlock the stairs.

pic.alt: Power panel to shock
Eagle head to grapple to
Power panel to shock
Golden Fountain Pen artifact
Ritual location (Nero's Apartment)

step.title: Jack Vincent's Ritual (Canal District)
step.description: In Beast Mode, melee a crate at the start of the canal and shock a power panel at the end of the canal. Then, grapple to a balcony on the Ruby Rabbit, run to the bottom floor, and shock the power panel to unlock the stairs.

pic.alt: Crate to melee
Power panel to shock
Eagle head to grapple to
Power panel to shock
Badge artifact
Ritual location (Ruby Rabbit)

step.title: Jessica Rose's Ritual (Footlight District)
step.description: In Beast Mode, jump to a ledge near the Perk Machine and melee a crate. Then, grapple to The Black Lace Burlesque building and shock the power panel to unlock the door.

pic.alt: Crate to melee
Eagle head to grapple to
Power panel to shock
Hairpiece artifact
Ritual location (The Black Lace Burlesque)

step.title: Floyd Campbell's Ritual (Waterfront District)
step.description: In Beast Mode, grapple to a balcony and melee a crate. Then, run down to the water and melee the door to The Anvil.

pic.alt: Eagle head to grapple to
Crate to melee
Door to melee
Championship Belt artifact
Ritual location (The Anvil)

step.title: Teleport to the Subway Station
step.description: There are 3 wooden doors that can be meleed while in Beast Mode (one in each district). Each door leads to a different rift. Interact on a rift to spawn the portal, then use it to enter the Subway Station. You are only required to open one rift, but the others can be opened too. Inside the Subway Station, you can use Beast Mode to shock a power panel to open the stairs leading up to the Junction.

pic.alt: Location 1 - Canal District, in the canal
Location 2 - Footlight District, to the right when going from the city to the Junction
Location 3 - Waterfront District, to the left when going from the Train Station to the Junction
Rift to interact
Portal to the Subway Station
Power panel to open the door to the Junction

step.title: Unlock Pack-a-Punch
step.description: After all 4 Gateworms are collected, go to the Subway Station and a wall will vanish when you approach it. Place the 4 Gateworms on pedestals, then place the Summoning Key on the table at the entrance. After placing the first 2 Gateworms, walls will appear that you can wallrun on to get to the other side. Survive the ritual to unlock Pack-a-Punch.

pic.alt: Wall to walk up to
One of the Gateworm pedestals
Table to place the Summoning Key
Pack-a-Punch

subsections.description: Plant pods will grow all around the map that can be harvested to get a reward. Each player must collect a Fumigator from around the map before collecting the rewards. Fumigators can spawn around the whole map, but one will always spawn somewhere on Easy Street. The pods will start green and eventually turn red and then purple, after several rounds. The rewards are better for harvesting a higher level pod.

pic.alt: Possible Fumigator location on Easy Street
Green pod
Red pod
Purple pod

subsections.description: The train can move between the 3 districts and can be purchased for 500 points. The starting district is randomized each game, but it can be seen moving at the start of the game after opening the first door.

pic.alt: Green button to activate train and lever to change destination

subsections.description: Juggernog, Speed Cola, and Double Tap Root Beer will be randomized between the 3 districts. Next to each door that leads to a district, there is a box with a glowing bottle that represents which Perk Machine is in that district. Every Perk Machine has a power panel next to it that must be shocked in Beast Mode before the machine can be used.

pic.alt: Quick Revive - on Easy Street
Stamin-Up - in the Junction
Juggernog - in one of the 3 districts
Speed Cola - in one of the 3 districts
Double Tap Root Beer - in one of the 3 districts
Widow's Wine - in the Subway Station
Mule Kick - on the stairs going from the Junction to the Subway Station
Location 1 - Canal District, at the bottom of the stairs that lead to the Train Station
Location 2 - Footlight District, on the bridge between the Train Station and the Perk Machine
Location 3 - Waterfront District, towards the ritual room from the Train Station by a Beat Mode pedestal

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located in Footlight District (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - across from the Perk Machine
Location 2 - to the left of the Perk Machine
Location 3 - in the room just past the Perk Machine

subsections.description: Located in Canal District (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - up the stairs from the Junction
Location 2 - on the bridge from the Perk Machine to the Junction
Location 3 - by the Perk Machine

subsections.description: Located in Waterfront District (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - up the stairs towards the Perk Machine
Location 2 - to the right of the Perk Machine
Location 3 - by the door going from the Perk Machine to the Train Station

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Each player can equip the shield.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in Canal District

sections.description: Collect 3 fuses and place them in the Subway Station. Summon the Civil Protector at 1 of 4 locations around the map.

subsections.description: Located in Waterfront District (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a barrel between the Perk Machine and the Train Station
Location 2 - on the railing up by the Train Station
Location 3 - on a box just outside the Train Station

subsections.description: Located in Canal District (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a box on the bridge from the Perk Machine to the Train Station
Location 2 - on a cart on the bridge from the Perk Machine to the Train Station
Location 3 - on the railing on the bridge from the Perk Machine to the Train Station

subsections.description: Located in Footlight District (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a barrel from the Perk Machine to the Train Station
Location 2 - on the bridge from the Perk Machine to the Train Station
Location 3 - on the ground outside the Train Station going towards the Perk Machine

subsections.description: Place the fuses in the Emergency Response Master Switch in the Subway Station.

pic.alt: All 3 fuses placed

subsections.description: Summon at any of the 4 locations around the map for 2000 points.

pic.alt: Location 1 - the Junction
Location 2 - Canal District
Location 3 - Footlight District
Location 4 - Waterfront District

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Drops after killing a Margwa.

pic.alt: Margwa Heart

subsections.description: Sometimes drops when killing a Parasite or Meatball (Insanity Elemental).

pic.alt: Xenomatter

subsections.description: Random reward from harvesting a purple pod.

pic.alt: Margwa Tentacle

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Only 1 player can pick up the Apothicon Servant.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in Footlight District

step.title: 1. Open the sword statue room
step.description: Take the train through each district to find the 3 hidden groups of symbols. The symbol groups will be through building windows at eye height while riding the train, and they are randomized each game. Then, enter Beast Mode in the Subway Station and shock the 3 matching groups of symbols on the wall across from the PaP room. If done correctly, the wall will open up. If you enter the wrong symbols, you must wait until the next round to try again.

pic.alt: Canal District window, looking left after leaving the station
Footlight District window, looking left after leaving the station
Waterfront District window, looking right after leaving the station
Wall with symbols (only seen in Beast Mode)

step.title: 2. Feed souls to the eggs
step.description: Each player must pick up an Apothicon Egg from the sword statue and place it on egg holder statues around the map. Each player must place their egg on all 4 egg holder statues and kill enough zombies around it until it can be picked up again. All 4 egg holder statues are inside wooden crates that must be meleed in Beast Mode to open.

pic.alt: Location to get egg
Wooden crate to melee
Statue in the Subway Station
Statue in Canal District
Statue in Footlight District
Statue in Waterfront District
Egg placed on a statue
Glowing egg after getting enough souls at this location

step.title: 3. Return egg
step.description: After collecting souls at all 4 statues, return your egg to the sword statue in the Subway Station. Then, interact again to pick up your sword.

pic.alt: Location to get sword

step.title: 1. Aquire a new egg
step.description: After getting the Apothicon Sword, each player must pick up an egg from a Keeper ghost in their own ritual room. Nero Blackstone's room is in his apartment in the Junction. Jack Vincent's room is in the Ruby Rabbit in Canal District. Jessica Rose's room is in The Black Lace Burlesque in Footlight District. Floyd Campbell's room is in The Anvil in Waterfront District.

pic.alt: Keeper ghost offering an egg for Nero

step.title: 2. Kill Margwas
step.description: There are 4 red circles around the map, and each player must place their egg in all 4 circles. Each player can only do this once per round, and no one else can do this while someone else has an active circle. After activating a circle, Margwas will spawn and target the player who activated it. After killing the Margwas, the circle will dim and your egg will be automatically returned.

pic.alt: Location 1 - the Junction
Location 2 - Canal District
Location 3 - Footlight District
Location 4 - Waterfront District
Active circle

step.title: 3. Retrieve upgraded sword
step.description: After finishing your 4 circles, return to your Keeper ghost and interact to return the egg. Interact again to pick up the upgraded sword.

pic.alt: Upgraded sword

subsections.description: After all players get the upgraded sword, a book can be interacted on the floor in Nero's Apartment.

pic.alt: Book to interact
Floating book after interacting

subsections.description: After interacting on the book, a Keeper flag will appear in the Subway Station. One player must pick up the flag and place it on an electric spot on the map. There are 8 spots to place the flag, and they can be done in any order. After placing the flag, defend it from Meatballs, Parasites, and the Shadowman. The Shadowman will randomly appear floating near the flag, and will usually destroy the flag in one shot. If the flag breaks, you can pick up a new one in the Subway Station. If you successfully defend the flag, it will make a sound and can be picked up. After picking it back up, you must place it on one of the other electric spots and defend it again. There will now be large glowing symbols on the ground that must be avoided too. If you successfully defend it the second time, pick it up and deliver it to a Keeper ghost in one of the 4 ritual rooms. This must be done 4 times in total, one for each Keeper ghost and ritual room. Each time you deliver a flag to a Keeper ghost, the 2 spots you defended the flag at will no longer be there, and you must wait a round before the flag can be picked up again in the Subway Station.

pic.alt: Flag spawn location, in the Subway Station
Flag placed in a defend location
Shadowman winding up an attack
Flag brought to one of the 4 Keeper ghosts
Defend location 1 - up the stairs from the Subway Station
Defend location 2 - near the entrance to Footlight District
Defend location 3 - near the entrance to Waterfront District
Defend location 4 - in the Junction, just outside Easy Street
Defend location 5 - by the portal to Waterfront District
Defend location 6 - by the stairs to the Train Station in Waterfront District
Defend location 7 - near the entrance to Canal District
Defend location 8 - across the canal from the Ruby Rabbit in Canal District

subsections.description: You cannot leave the boss fight until it's done. Make sure you have perks, a full shield, strong weapons, and any gobblegum you want to bring.

step.title: Start the fight
step.description: All 4 players must give their Keeper Sword to one of the 4 Keepers in the Pack-a-Punch room.

pic.alt: Keeper to give sword to

step.title: Shoot the Shadowman
step.description: After giving the 4 swords to the Keepers, they will temporarily disable the Shadowman's shield. Shoot the Shadowman to deal damage, and he will teleport around the arena as he takes damage.

pic.alt: Shadowman without a shield

step.title: Disable the Shield
step.description: After a time, the Shadowman will regain his shield and return to the center of the arena. Interact on all 4 Keepers to disable his shield again. Repeat whenever the shield comes back.

pic.alt: Keepers disabling the shield

step.title: Trap the Shadowman
step.description: After dealing enough damage, the Shadowman will teleport back above the ritual table. While he's hovering over the table, one player must interact on the table to trap the Shadowman in the Summoning Key.

pic.alt: Trapping the Shadowman

subsections.description: The final 2 steps require 4 players in the game. The map will slowly start to kill you, and you must keep running into the glowing white symbols to refresh your health. Each time a Margwa is killed, one of the Beast Mode pedestals will be enabled. You will be able to stay in Beast Mode as long as you don't take enough damage from Margwas or by not standing in the white circles enough.

Each of the 3 Train Stations have a box that must be shocked in Beast Mode to electrify the rail. The rail will only be powered a short time before needing to be shocked again. One player should wait in Beast Mode in the Junction, two players should be in Beast Mode ready to shock the boxes, and the last player should be near the other Train Station and not in Beast Mode. The player not in Beast Mode should call the train to their location, then quickly enter Beast Mode. Then, the 3 players by the Train Stations should shock the boxes so all 3 rails are electrified at the same time, while the train is still moving, and before the train passes through the Junction. When the train passes through the Junction, if all 3 rails are electrified, the large Gateworm will be destroyed by the train. As soon as this happens, the player standing in the Junction must shock the 3 Keepers under the circle of the rail track. If done correctly, the cutscene will play and the quest is finished.

pic.alt: Canal District box to shock
Footlight District box to shock
Waterfront District box to shock
Location where the 3 Keepers will be that must be shocked

subsections.description: Interact with 3 wooden radios. To play the instrumental version instead, interact on the first radio twice and the other two radios once.

pic.alt: Location 1 - Canal District, on a table through the entrance of the Ruby Rabbit and to the left
Location 2 - Footlight District, on a bench in the Train Station
Location 3 - Waterfront District, upstairs in The Anvil

subsections.description: Interact to pick up 3 objects, then interact on the microphone on the stage in The Black Lace Burlesque.

pic.alt: Object 1 (Microphone stand) - in Nero's Apartment, to the left of the knife target
Object 2 (Wire) - Canal District, under the stairs in the canal that lead up towards the Ruby Rabbit
Object 3 (Microphone) - in the Subway Station, on the ground by a bench near the portal to Waterfront District
Microphone to start song

subsections.description: Just after starting the game, you can shoot the Shadowman to skip rounds. The first skip goes to round 5 with 1500 points. The next skip is round 10 with 5500 points. The final skip is round 15 with 16500 points.

pic.alt: The Shadowman

subsections.description: Kill 100 zombies with Li'l Arnies, then throw a Li'l Arnie at 3 objects around the map. The objects will disappear when done successfully. Lastly, throw a Li'l Arnie at the ritual location in Footlight District. Some Gateworms and a Li'l Arnie will do a dance, and your Li'l Arnies will be upgraded.

pic.alt: Location 1 - a tophat on a mannequin head in Nero's Apartment
Location 2 - a cane in Canal District, on the first floor of the Ruby Rabbit
Location 3 - a bowtie on a shelf in Waterfront District, in a back room of The Anvil
Ritual location in The Black Lace Burlesque
Upgrade dance
A purple upgraded Li'l Arnie

subsections.description: Score a perfect game in bowling. Use the Rocket Shield boost to kill 10 zombies in a single boost, and repeat for 12 times in a row. Each time you successfully get 10 in 1 boost, you will hear a bowling pin sound effect. If you don't kill 10 in a single boost, the counter will reset. After 12 in a row, your shield will upgrade and hold a max of 4 boosts.

pic.alt: Lining up zombies for the Rocket Shield

subsections.description: There are 4 Devil-O Donuts carts and 3 Holly's Cream Cakes carts around the map. Get a Trip Mine kill in front of each of the donut carts or each of the cream cake carts. After you've damaged each of the opposing side's carts, your Trip Mines will have the opposite pastry's effect after exploding.

pic.alt: Trip Mine wall-buy, in Waterfront District on the side of The Anvil
Donut cart 1 - in the Junction, near the door to Waterfront District
Donut cart 2 - Canal District, going left from the Junction below the Perk Machine room
Donut cart 3 - Footlight District, between the Perk Machine and the Train Station
Donut cart 4 - Waterfront District, near the portal location
Cream cake Trip Mine after sabotaging the donut carts
Cream cake cart 1 - in the Junction, near Stamin-Up
Cream cake cart 2 - Canal District, across from the Ruby Rabbit
Cream cake cart 3 - Footlight District, across from the Perk Machine
Donut Trip Mine after sabotaging the cream cake carts

subsections.description: Pack-a-Punch must be unlocked first. Go to Waterfront District and look out to the water and to the left. Using a sniper, aim down the sniper scope to a window.

pic.alt: Location to stand
Window to aim at
Jumpscare

subsections.description: At least 6 Margwas must be killed before doing these steps.

step.title: Shoot the 6 Margwa hearts
step.description: After 6 Margwas have been killed, 6 Margwa hearts will be seen around the map. Shoot all 6 hearts while riding the train, and in no more than 2 uses of the train. The hearts will respawn if the train was used more than twice before all 6 hearts have been shot. The order of locations shown here are from Waterfront District to Footlight District, then Footlight District to Canal District.

pic.alt: Location 1 - looking left after leaving Waterfront District, on a sign
Location 2 - looking left after leaving Waterfront District, on a building wall
Location 3 - looking left going towards Footlight District, on the 'H' of a theater sign
Location 4 - looking left going towards Footlight District, very briefly visible on a coffee sign
Location 5 - looking right after leaving Footlight District, in the Junction on a Devil-O Donuts sign by the circle in the track
Location 6 - looking right going towards Canal District, on the 'Y' of the Ruby Rabbit sign

step.title: Find the head
step.description: The head is invisible but can be equipped by interacting on the correct location. A white shimmer will occasionally flash at the location. There are 4 possibe locations, and only 1 of them will be available for 1 specific player at a time. Another hat will spawn after the other one was equipped by the correct player.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the Junction, on a table in Nero's Apartment
Location 2 - Canal District, on a balcony on the top floor of the Ruby Rabbit
Location 3 - Footlight District, on the stage in the The Black Lace Burlesque
Location 4 - Waterfront District, by some lockers in the back room of The Anvil
Location 5 - in the Subway Station, in the train car in the middle of the room

subsections.description: Go to the laundry store at the exit of Easy Street in the Junction. Explode a grenade on the suit with the laundry ticket. A Widow's Wine grenade will make it easier to explode on the suit. Then, interact on the laundry ticket that lands on the box.

pic.alt: Laundry ticket on the suit
Sal's laundry ticket

subsections.description: Go to Canal District and up the stairs near the Junction. In the room with the 4 lion statues, throw a Widow's Wine grenade into each of the 4 lion mouths. When done successfully, one of the statues will have a white Gobblegum in its mouth that can be interacted to pick up. Place the gum on a plate in the ice cream store in the Junction next to Stamin-Up. After a few rounds, the gum will grow slightly larger. Interact to get a random Gobblegum.

pic.alt: 4 lion statues
Widow's Wine grenade in lion's mouth
Gobblegum in lion's mouth
Plate to place the Gobblegum
Grown Gobblegum

subsections.description: Changes your screen to black and white for the rest of the game. Go to Waterfront District, upstairs in The Anvil. While looking at the correct picture, reload your weapon while crouching.

pic.alt: The picture to aim at
